pr_title: Normalize the build-info and git properties files from the bundle cache.

timeline.message:
Normalize the build-info and git properties files from the bundle cache.

This way it is possible to specify the build cache and run locally
with --build-cache for usage of build cache.

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>

timeline.bodyText: That is smart 🥇 I did not know that it exists.
timeline.author: plavjanik
